extendedInfo.description: Public domain Christian hymn lyrics- Contains 825 songs- Installs to SD- Requires no special permissions- No ads- Filter song list by title, author, lyrics, category, favorites- Share hymn- View hymn on Youtube- Works on practically all Android devices- Small footprintAdditional features are available in the paid version Hymn Lyrics Plus:- Add custom songs directly to app- Show chords for popular songs- 12 different foreground/background colors- Show refrain between all stanzas- Hymn of the day notification------FAQ------How can I search for a song?Press the menu button and then hit Filters.How can I see all the Christmas hymns?In Filters, select "Filter by Category", then select "Christmas"How can I submit a song to be included in a future release?Go here:http://ecodia.com/submit_hymn/Why didn't a song that I submitted show up in a release?It'll take one or two releases for a song to show up.  Songs are added in a batch of 25 or 50, so it depends on which batch it got submitted in.  Also only songs that are public domain songs will be included in Hymn Lyrics.  Any songs that that are not public domain will get removed.  Can I get online forum support?Go here:http://www.ecodia.com/forum/viewforum.php?f=12How can I contact the developer?Send an email to otseng@ecodia.com
